  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AtomSpecException
    This is an exception for data that doesn't match the specification.

Package com.colorfulsoftware.atom Description

Atomsphere v3.0.2 - a Java feed library for the Atom 1.0 specification.

Use this library to add atom feeds into your application. The api is driven by the FeedDoc class which enables you to read and write atom documents. The Feed element and all of its sub elements are serializable, immutable and thread safe. See the Project Page for examples of how to use the API.
